title: 'Unmatched Comfort and Hygiene: Whisper Ultra Clean Sanitary Pads - Your Perfect Companion!'
body: Whisper Ultra Clean Sanitary Pads have become an absolute essential in my life. These pads offer an unbeatable combination of comfort, hygiene, and reliability that has made my monthly routine so much more manageable.  The first thing that struck me about these pads is their incredible softness. The gentle touch and the soft wings ensure that I stay comfortable throughout the day, no matter how busy or active I am. They are thin yet absorbent, providing a feeling of dryness and freshness that is truly impressive.  One of the standout features for me is the XL+ size. It offers extra coverage and protection, providing me with peace of mind during those heavy flow days. These pads are incredibly effective at keeping leaks at bay, and I no longer worry about mishaps.  The hygiene aspect is equally important, and Whisper Ultra Clean does not disappoint. The pads are individually wrapped, making them easy to carry discreetly in my bag. The secure, leak-proof packaging ensures that they remain clean and sanitary until I'm ready to use them.  The 50-pad pack is convenient and long-lasting, saving me the hassle of frequent purchases. I appreciate that Whisper understands the needs of women and offers such a comprehensive solution.  In conclusion, Whisper Ultra Clean Sanitary Pads are a game-changer for any woman seeking comfort, hygiene, and peace of mind during her period. These pads have truly raised the bar, and I can't imagine using anything else. If you haven't tried them yet, do yourself a favor and make the switch. You won't regret it!

title: 'Degraded quality'
body: I used this pad regularly since last few years, but now the quality has degraded beyond acceptable limit.. pad is almost useless, always leaks from wings and edges. Can't handle heavy flow at all. Can only be used for light flow. Other better and cheaper options are available in market. Never buying this again

body: Quality of this product is very worst now a days. it explodes on the side within 6-7 hours. Previously the quality was very good and long lasting but now it's very poor. It's completely waste of money. Please look into this issue. It's not fulfilling product value.
